definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: The OPC technique and its application in the oilfield gathering system are introduced mainly.
sentences.chinese: 主要介紹了OPC技術及其在油田集輸系統中的應用。

sentences.english: Niujuanhu oilfield is located in Santanhu basin, with complicated geology conditions.
sentences.chinese: 地處三塘湖盆地的牛圈湖油田，地質條件比較複雜。

sentences.english: Most of the sand two oil reservoir in Pucheng oil field belongs to uneven oil reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 濮城油田沙二下油藏屬於多油層非均質油藏。

sentences.english: The electric power system of Jiangsu oilfield has its own network and characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 江蘇油田的電力系統自成網絡並獨具特點。

sentences.english: From tuha oil field , like flute and vocality.
sentences.chinese: 來自吐哈油田，愛好長笛演奏和聲樂。

sentences.english: On site experiment at oil field proves that the heat barrier pipe made by welding method has rather good quality.
sentences.chinese: 焊接的隔熱管經油田現場試驗，結果表明其性能良好。

sentences.english: Combined with the theoretical research, Putaohua oilfield pilot test is proved successful.
sentences.chinese: 結合理論研究在葡萄花油田現場試驗，取得較好效果。

sentences.english: Biandong Oilfield has three Conflict in waterflooding developed zone.
sentences.chinese: 卞東油田注水開發調整效果差。

sentences.english: The salt-water fluids may correspond to bottom water or edge water of oil field.
sentences.chinese: 鹽水流體可能與油田底水或邊水相當。

sentences.english: This paper briefly presents the development status in the second block of Shengtuo oil field.
sentences.chinese: 該文簡要介紹了勝坨油田二區開發狀況。

sentences.english: Acid-fracturing is an important technique to stimulate in Lunnan oil field.
sentences.chinese: 酸壓改造是輪南油田增儲上產的主要技術手段。

sentences.english: The field could enter production as soon as 2012.
sentences.chinese: 這座油田可能在2012年就能投產。

sentences.english: L(J)MZD-1.14SYDanti-electricity stealingmetering box is specially designed for users of oil field.
sentences.chinese: 14SYD型防竊電計量箱專爲油田用戶設計。

sentences.english: Basic well pattern in eastern Nan2 area, Saertu Oilfield is the typical one.
sentences.chinese: 薩爾圖油田南二區東部基礎井網具有較好的代表性。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an emptying settling tank of a measuring station for collecting and transporting oil field.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種油田集輸的計量站放空沉降罐。

sentences.english: The hydrogeologic situation and the distribution of major oil region in Zhongyuan Oilfield are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了中原油田的水文地質概況及主要油區的分佈。

definition: China Petroleum and Chemical Corporation, Sinopec/abbr. for 中國石油化工股份有限公司|中国石油化工股份有限公司
to explore/to survey/to prospect (for oil etc)/prospecting
